Name: Shield
Desc: Next attack deals no damage. If full, switch to broken. If broken, remove.

Name: Strength
Desc: +1 Damage per stack on your casts

Name: Burning
Desc: If you have at least one Fire, during Overnight phase, convert all Plants to Fire. Then, take 1 Damage per 2 Fire after this.

Name: Confusion
Desc: When this Minion would Retaliate, instead remove this token

Name: Rooted
Desc: When the army would move, this Enemy takes 1 damage instead. Remove this token.

Name: Weakened
Desc: Max stacks on this spell is 1. This spell must remain Active until this debuff is removed.

Name: Potent
Desc: When you cast this spell, apply the effect as if you had an extra stack. (Spell buffs are removed when taken out of slot.)
